sources.title: Cry of the Innocent (1980)
sources.description: An American insurance executive, who sees his wife and children die when a plane crashes into their vacation cottage on the Irish coast, uncovers a series of suspicious clues indicating that it was no accident after a pretty financial reporter who resembles his dead wife turns up. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/cry-of-the-innocent-1980/

sources.title: Cry of the Innocent (1980) directed by Michael O'Herlihy | Plane crash + Conspiracy + Green Beret
sources.description:
An American insurance executive, who sees his wife and children die when a plane crashes into their vacation cottage on the Irish coast, uncovers a series of suspicious clues indicating that it was no accident after a pretty financial reporter who resembles his dead wife turns up.

Cry of the Innocent is a 1980 American-Irish television film directed by Michael O'Herlihy. It is based on a story by Frederick Forsyth. Alternatively known as: An Eye for an Eye / Murder by Proxy

Main actors:
Rod Taylor - Steve Donegin
Joanna Pettet - Cynthia Donegin / Candia Leighton
Nigel Davenport - Gray Harrison Hunt
Cyril Cusack - Detective Inspector Tom Moloney
Walter Gotell - Jack Brewster
Jim Norton - Jasper Tooms
Alexander Knox - Thornton Donegin
Joe Cahill - Fritz Grossman

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: A Green Beret-veteran businessman investigates the plane crash in Ireland that killed his family.
metadata.Actors: Rod Taylor, Joanna Pettet, Nigel Davenport
